isis.stitle: TSI 96-12-02 - DT 408/466 and the International® 530 Engine Ring Gear For Use With Allison Transmission Models MT-654CR, MD 3000 & HdD 4000

subjectgroup.subject: DT 408/466 and the International® 530 Engine Ring Gear For Use With Allison Transmission Models MT-654CR, MD 3000 & HdD 4000

svcproc.title: DESCRIPTION
svcproc.para: The ring gear is not furnished with subject engines equipped with Allison automatic transmission Models MT-654CR, MD 3000 and HD 4000. It is part of the Allison trans./torq. converter assembly. This ring gear is not serviced through Navistar International Corp. Refer to an Allison authorized dealer. For the engine crankshaft flexplate, adapter and hardware refer to Navistar parts catalog(s) form MT-512A, 1171657 R2 or 1171681 R1; disregard the note referring to truck parts catalog for ring gear.
